content: Investments Savings Asked by AnonymousAsked on 26 Aug 2019What would be the best(cheapest) mode of converting SGD to USD for investment purposes (for instance need 30k USD)?1 answerAnswerBump2

Harvey TanLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 26 Aug 2019If you have an Interactive Broker account, the commission for the conversion is around 3 dollars. In return, you are getting close to the spot rate.0 comments1
